name: Mineoid
description:
Development

Thanks for the Mini Jam for the opportunity!

Most of the features, like the infinite map generation or parallax scrolling are things I've never done in Godot before- and haven't developed any game in a while, so this was a good learning and practice oppurtunity.

I may make a more polished, better designed version of this game idea in the future.

Gameplay

The ball is controlled by physics and gravity but you can push it left or right.

By breaking blocks you lose health but you can regain some of it by breaking red minerals and get some score by breaking blue ones.

The level is infinitely generated.

Rocks and player
